testsuite.name: SimpleSearchEngineTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Error in test #2
Program ran out of input. You tried to read more than expected.
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Arguments: --data names.txt
=== Menu === 1. Find a person 2. Print all people 0. Exit > 1
Enter a name or email to search all szuitable people. > burgess > 0 No matching people found.
=== Menu === 1. Find a person 2. Print all people 0. Exit
